original_content:
This week, Jonathan Bennett and Rob Campbell chat with Ben Meadors and Adam McQuilkin to talk about whats new with Meshtastic! Theres a lot. To start with, your favorite podcast host has gotten roped into doing development for the project. Theres a new Rust client, theres a way to run the firmware on Linux Native, and theres a shiny new web-based flasher tool!


 meshtastic.org
 https://flasher.meshtastic.org/

Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right in the Hackaday Discord? Have someone youd like use to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Next week were chatting with Simon Kelley about dnsmasq.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
